items.sentence: Tom bought a pizza and took it over to Mary's.
Tom asked Mary to tell John what he should do.
Tom is at the laundromat, washing his clothes.
Tom is a fast worker, but he does sloppy work.
Tom hasn't been doing his homework by himself.
Tom has always wanted to own his own business.
Tom had a piece of chocolate cake for dessert.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what she should bring.
Tom finished doing that about three hours ago.
Tom filled his thermos bottle with hot coffee.
